entry.title: Proof-of-Age (PoA): A Consensus Algorithm Encouraging Solo Mining

link.title: Proof-of-Age (PoA): A Consensus Algorithm Encouraging Solo Mining

entry.summary: Introducing a consensus algorithm that undermines the performance of mining pools, which threatens the decentralization of Bitcoin, in order to promote solo mining.

entry.title: Customize the Favicon
entry.summary:
The favicons of Chirpy are placed in the directory assets/img/favicons/. You may want to replace them with your own. The following sections will guide you to create and replace the default favicons.
Generate the favicon
Prepare a square image (PNG, JPG, or SVG) with a size of 512x512 or more, and then go to the online tool Real Favicon Generator and click the button Select your Favicon image ...
